title: Post game lobby takes forever to load
body: So for the past like month, after every game it takes like 1.5 minutes to 2 minutes to load the post game lobby. This has never happened to me before its not like a shitty computer problem i run at like 200 fps it randomly started happening any suggestions?

replies.body: What Eanruig said!  You might have close [close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled.  It's ended to reduce pc stress for a better in-game experience, so it may take a bit for the client to restart and get you to post-game.  Disabling the option should fix this!

In the options menu on the first "tab" there should be a check box to "close client during games". something like that, make sure it's un-checked and it will keep the client open/minimized in the background. Post-game stats and lobby _should _load within a reasonable time.
